learning_outcomes: Understand and use B2 Art and Literature vocabulary
Apply B2 Quantifiers structures in context

content.prompt_es: Escribe la respuesta correcta para completar la oración:
content.stimulus_en: I have ______ (neither) the time nor the money.

content.stimulus_en: ______ (both) of my sisters are doctors.

content.prompt_es: Escribe la respuesta correcta para completar la oración:
content.stimulus_en: ______ (both) of my sisters are doctors.
